Posts.Content: hello everyone, i'm trying to develop a better design for a mastectomy bra. therefor i'm building up a database with opinions and problems of the already available mastectomy bras. your opinion is very useful! please tell me about any problem you are confrunting with regarding this issue. if you want to send an email rather than answering here, this is my address: [emailÂ protected] thank you
